data.name: Squingle Demo
data.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord


About the Game





Before time there was only Squingle – and she needs your help to create the Universe!

The Spiraling Psychedelic Puzzle – Liquid crystal levels are alive, mystical, and other-worldly, offering a unique multisensory showcase that must be seen, heard and felt to be believed.

Grab the two revolving orbs and guide them through iridescent mazes that twist and turn. Will you discover the meaning of Squingle?




> WHAT'S IN THE DEMO?

Featuring 8 levels from the full game - Squingle Demo let's you experience Squingle where trailers and descriptions simply can't.
Join us! You won't regret it.


> FEATURES

o SENSORY SATISFACTION o

Relax with refreshing visuals and a 3D tactile gameplay experience only possible in VR.
Find your flow through 100 hand-crafted levels and a changing musical soundscape.

o GET COMPETITIVE o

Compete with Steam Leaderboards and Achievements – calling all Speed Runners – and challenge your own ghost at double-speed for double satisfaction.

o ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY o

Solve puzzles by switching your rotation with special orbs to find secret items, multiple paths and hidden routes, and master maneuvers around dangerous dances of obstacles.




Timing and movement are as important as puzzle solving in Squingle. Guide rotating orbs through glassy iridescent mazes, collecting objects and avoiding the edges.



Squingle can be played in short bursts or serious sessions. The consequences of making a mistake are low, which makes for a relaxing experience and encourages experimentation. Players can simply grab space to move the puzzle around.



With rewarding visuals and sound, casual players can just play through the levels. But there's plenty for serious gamers too with Steam Achievements online leaderboards for maximum competition. Make sure you find all the secrets!

data.short_description: A spiraling psychedelic puzzle – Squingle is a game of rhythm and satisfaction. Guide revolving orbs through pearlescent helical mazes that react to you like liquid crystal – but be careful! Avoid a choreography of obstacles along the way. Will you Squingle?
data.reviews:
“One of the most fascinating and original things ever seen in the world of video games.”
9.1/10 – VR Italia

“A one of a kind puzzle experience with wonderful visuals and music, as well as excellent gameplay.”
91% – VRGameCritic

“Squingle is among the heavyweights like Rez Infinite, Thumper and Tetris Effect.”
VR Italia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower-end VR-ready specs work fine.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
